title: Voice potion

properties.name: description
properties.value: The voice potion was an item that was involved in the 2014 Halloween event, during which the player completed a series of chores meant for the Grim Reaper's late assistant. It was found by searching the fireplace, and it needed to be placed on the bookshelf. The potion in question could not be used by players.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Voice potion
 Voice potion was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
Voice potion
Released23 October 2014 (Update)
Removal6 November 2014 (Update)
MembersNo
Quest itemNo
Properties
TradeableNo
EquipableNo
StackableNo
DestroyYou'll have to find another from the Reaper's house.
ExamineA 'voice of doom' potion used to deepen your voice.
Values
Value1 coin
AlchemyNot alchemisable
Weight0 kg
Advanced data
Item ID12844

The voice potion was an item that was involved in the 2014 Halloween event, during which the player completed a series of chores meant for the Grim Reaper's late assistant. It was found by searching the fireplace, and it needed to be placed on the bookshelf. The potion in question could not be used by players.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
6 November 2014
(update)
  • The item was recoloured with the removal of the 2014 Halloween event.
  • The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
